name: Square Defender (Korn)
description:
Shoot the bad guy and protect your beloved Square. Keep yourself and Square "connected" otherwise bad things are gonna happen. Get the highest score and post it in the comment!!

DETAIL : 

You are Circle, the one who protect Square. Keep yourself and Square connected. If you somehow disconnect it, you can go near the Square to re-connect. Square need some water to survive. So you need to occasionally go in the ocean to feed him through the connected link. But if you stay in the ocean for too long, you'll drown from it. If health go below zero, Game Over. Have Fun !!

CONTROL : DetailKeysMove your CircleW A S DShootLeft MouseStart the GameSpace
